alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 9:51PM AKST until December 09 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: Temperatures are running cooler than previously expected tonight and snow has begun falling across Juneau. Additionally, latest measurements suggest higher snow ratios between 13:1 to 20:1 are occurring which are leading to higher snow totals. Snow ratios are expected to lower through Saturday afternoon causing snow to accumulate less rapidly. Snow will begin to tapper off through Saturday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow could be difficult to manage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
